TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AutomationElementMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Contains values that specify the type of reference to use when returning UI Automation elements. These values are used in the property.These values are used in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Full é o padrão e especifica que os elementos retornados contenham uma referência completa a subjacente [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].Full is the default, and specifies that returned elements contain a full reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. NONE especifica que os elementos retornados não têm nenhuma referência na interface do usuário subjacente e contêm apenas informações armazenadas em cache.None specifies that the returned elements have no reference to the underlying UI, and contain only cached information. Algumas operações nos elementos, tais como ou , exigem uma referência completa; a tentativa de realizar essas em um elemento que não possui nenhum resulta em um .Certain operations on elements, such as or , require a full reference; attempting to perform these on an element that has none results in an . Usar nenhum pode ser mais eficiente quando são necessárias apenas as propriedades, pois evita a sobrecarga envolvida na configuração de referências completas.Using None can be more efficient when only properties are needed, as it avoids the overhead involved in setting up full references. ## Examples O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir o modo de um .The following example shows how to set the mode on a . [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#183](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#183)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#183](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#183)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode Full = int32(1)

summary.span: Specifies that returned elements have a full reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode None = int32(0)

summary.span: Specifies that returned elements have no reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] and contain only cached information.

span.span: Specifies that returned elements have no reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] and contain only cached information.

summary.span: This mode might be used, for example, to retrieve the names of items in a list box without obtaining references to the items themselves.

span.span: This mode might be used, for example, to retrieve the names of items in a list box without obtaining references to the items themselves.
